sentences.english: The Hensons continued north, arriving at last in Buffalo, N.
sentences.chinese: 亨森一家繼續往北走，最後來到紐約州的布法羅。

sentences.english: James Williams is the super intendant of public schools in , New York.
sentences.chinese: 詹姆斯威廉斯是紐約布法羅公立學校的監管人。

sentences.english: She had been travelling to Buffalo to mark what would have been his 58th birthday, her sister said.
sentences.chinese: 她的姐姐說，她去布法羅是爲了紀念他58歲生日。

sentences.english: PJ'S Buffalo Bill to grow a new coat.
sentences.chinese: 珠子的布法羅草案增加了新的大衣。

sentences.english: And he never traveled further west than the city of Buffalo, New York.
sentences.chinese: 他最遠到過的西部城市是紐約的布法羅市。
